inferCSN 2.0.0
  • Reference

Calculate AUROC Metric

Source: R/network_evaluation.R
calculate_auroc.Rd

Calculates AUROC metric with optional visualization

calculate_auroc(
  network_table,
  ground_truth,
  return_plot = FALSE,
  line_color = "#1563cc",
  line_width = 1
)

Arguments

network_table

A data frame of predicted network structure

ground_truth

A data frame of ground truth network

return_plot

Logical value indicating whether to generate plot

line_color

Color for plot lines

line_width

Width for plot lines

Value

A list containing metric and optional plot

Examples

data("example_matrix")
data("example_ground_truth")
network_table <- inferCSN(example_matrix)
#> ℹ [2025-05-28 02:34:47] Running for <dense matrix>.
#> ℹ [2025-05-28 02:34:47] Checking input parameters.
#> ℹ [2025-05-28 02:34:47] Using L0 sparse regression model.
#> ℹ [2025-05-28 02:34:47] Using 1 core
#> ✔ [2025-05-28 02:34:47] Run done.
calculate_auroc(
  network_table,
  example_ground_truth,
  return_plot = TRUE
)
#> $metrics
#>   Metric Value
#> 1  AUROC 0.952
#> 
#> $plot

#>
